message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $175.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $175 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
I understand that $175 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $155.
I'm getting closer to what I'm comfortable with, but $155 is still a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far away from my initial price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $150.
I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last concession. I'll pay $145 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $152.50.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $142.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last concession, but I think that's as high as I can go.
